title: CTF Auto-Solver
description: Automated capture-the-flag challenge solver using machine learning and pattern recognition. Supports web, crypto, and binary exploitation categories.

title: DNS Dashboard
description: Real-time DNS monitoring and analytics dashboard with geographic visualization and performance metrics for multiple DNS providers.

title: YOLOv5-K8s
description: Scalable YOLOv5 object detection service deployed on Kubernetes with auto-scaling, load balancing, and real-time inference API.

title: Network Security Scanner
description: Comprehensive network security assessment tool with vulnerability scanning, port analysis, and automated reporting capabilities.

title: Blockchain Analytics
description: Cryptocurrency transaction analysis platform with real-time monitoring, suspicious activity detection, and compliance reporting.

title: IoT Device Manager
description: Centralized IoT device management system with remote monitoring, firmware updates, and security policy enforcement.
